translations.translation: Logs Data Platform allows you to create and host Elasticsearch index. These index can be used for the data configuration of a Kibana instance (to store settings, visualizations, and dashboards), to index to static data, or to enrich or correlate your logs. You can use these index with most of the tools and applications compatible with the Elasticsearch REST API.
An error has occurred while retrieving index quota: {{message}}
An error has occurred while retrieving index
Are you sure you want to delete the following front facing service: {{name}}?
